input.sentences: [female] and her kids went on a vacation to location
there was a festival about smurfs | kids were really excited to take pictures with it
they think burning idols | burns away evils in society
it actually binds people together too and makes everyone really happy
output.sentences: The mother took her kids to take pictures with the papa smurf prop.
They joined in with others for a group photo.
The situation became weird; people started burning papa smurf.
Papa smurf became fully engulfed in flames.
A riot with more fire started on the street.
